column4: Hi, guys. I have a problem with firefox and flash (I install the nonfree adobe flash player). But the flash stuff in firefox doesn't seem to show even after the install.

Hi, guys. I have a problem with firefox and flash (I install the nonfree adobe flash player). But the flash stuff in firefox doesn't seem to show even after the install. Sorry for the second msg but I'm in hurry : ) SO, pls help me..
You won't be able to get it working tonight.
the flashplugin-nonfree package points to a broken link on the adobe site
where can I find an older (working) version? thanks for the quick response
I'm not sure.. I'd definitely like to know though!
